data.eml:eml: A new species, Ceriana dirickxi (Syrphidae, Eristalinae, Cerioidini), is described and illustrated from Zimbabwe. A key to the Afrotropical species of Ceriana is given.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article F. Christian Thompson (2013): A new species, Ceriana dirickxi (Syrphidae, Eristalinae, Cerioidini), is described and illustrated from Zimbabwe. A key to the Afrotropical species of Ceriana is given.
